newsitem.title: DENMARK: FORECAST - Higher Danish Aug c/a, trade surplus seen.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Higher Danish Aug c/a, trade surplus seen.

text.p: Eight analysts polled by Reuters on Monday forecast higher Danish foreign trade excluding ships and current account surpluses for August.
The panel saw the current account surplus at an average 1.4 billion crowns, with estimates between a low of 0.6 billion crowns and a maximum 2.1 billion crowns, compared to July's 0.0 billion crowns.

As regards foreign trade excluding ships, the analysts forecast an average surplus of 2.5 billion crowns for August, with estimates spanning from 2.1 billion to 3.2 billion crowns, against July's 1.121 billion crown surplus.
The national statistics office releases the Danish August current account and foreign trade data at 0830 gmt on Tuesday November 5.
